ygData.subject: Cloak the big joke....
ygData.msgSnippet: Ok has anyone actually seen a tattered cloak or is it a pipe dream... I spent 2 hrs last night tying for the cloak red 5 quest didn t work and i didn t think
ygData.messageBody:
Ok has anyone actually seen a tattered cloak or is it a pipe dream...
I spent 2 hrs last night tying for the cloak red 5 quest didn't work
and i didn't think it would but ohh well. The other option was the orcs
in butcher block and lesser fay that supposidly drop it following up on
this tommorrow. we should do a list on known failures i agree:) Btw has
anyone heard anything about a bomb that we can make that does 60dmg?
There was talk of fireworks and big bumba from a gnome site my friend saw
combine all 4 works and bomb is made.... doesn't work of course. Could be
a dream but worth a shot. I will update on the cloak quest i am on hehe.:)


Grundup puddlejumper necro of tinkering magic:)
